BIO

There is no one thing to define what Robert can do. His background is diverse. From working as a carpenter for 10 years through various family businesses to traveling nationally as a pool technician. He has now found himself a passion for web design and technology. Living in Mexico city he loves the connectivity of everything he does. Teaching english provides him with an outlet to connect with all kinds of people, and is the perfect compliment to his aspirations as a web developer. Did I mention he's a musician as well? Rob has been playing guitar since he was 11 years old. If your ever in the Portales neighborhood, You might find him at a local cafe on a friday if your lucky.
